name: Charlie's Inferno DEMO
description:
Charlie's Inferno is a videogame adaptation of the homonymous song by That Handsome Devil!

Download the demo now and help Charlie get where he worked so hard for while alive: Heaven. Do you have the right reflexes and the right amount of patience to overcome every trial?

The game was developed by me in GameMaker: Studio as a little side project; there was no dedicated artist involved, therefore external assets (song, sounds and graphics) have been used - each source is promptly credited in-game or in this page.

I will be glad to work along with an artist as I continue the game's development, giving the game the original and consistent graphic style it deserves.

N.B.: plug out any controller you might have should you notice huge desync between the screen lyrics and the song itself! Also, F4 for fullscreen.

The Demo is available for free. If you like it, please talk about it with your friends, leave feedback and, if possible, consider supporting the game with a little donation!
